'''Attendants''' is an [[aura]] that designates one enemy (usually an [[Elite Enemy]] or other powerful enemy) as a "leader" and other enemies as "attendants." The attendants will provide certain buffs to the leader. The leader and attendant will be marked with a green aura, with the leader being marked with a large circle and attendants being marked with a smaller circle connected to the leader by green lines.

==Gameplay Notes==
* There are 3 types of Attendant effects:
*# More Attendants do not spawn after the current ones are killed.
*# The leader spawns in a set of Attendants after the current ones are killed.
*# The leader removes the current Attendants and spawns in new ones every 60 seconds.
* In some variations, each Attendant will also increase the leader's [[ATK]] by 10%.
